dataset.title: A new species of Reticulolaelaps Costa (Acari: Laelapidae) associated with Tapinoma sp. (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Iran, with a review of the world species

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Joharchi, O., Babaeian, E. (2015): A new species of Reticulolaelaps Costa (Acari: Laelapidae) associated with Tapinoma sp. (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Iran, with a review of the world species. Acarologia 55 (1): 33-40, DOI: 10.1051/acarologia/20152146, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.1051/acarologia/20152146

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

gbif.citation: Joharchi O, Babaeian E, carolina (2015). A new species of Reticulolaelaps Costa (Acari: Laelapidae) associated with Tapinoma sp. (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Iran, with a review of the world species. Plazi.org taxonomic treatments database. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.1051/acarologia/20152146 accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-08-28.
